name: @heiwa4126/hello5
description: TypeScript hello world library with dual ES modules/CommonJS support. Features GitHub Actions trusted publishing to npmjs with Sigstore attestation.

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run smoke-test
scripts.format:full: pnpm pkg fix && biome format --write . && dprint fmt && textlint --fix "**/*.md"
scripts.smoke-test: node examples/ex1.mjs && node examples/ex2.cjs && tsx examples/ex3.ts
scripts.link: mkdir -p node_modules/@heiwa4126 && cd node_modules/@heiwa4126 && rm -f hello5 && ln -sf ../.. hello5
